learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate knowledge in the specific topic area

assessments.task_description:
Assessment procedures will be specified by the supervising faculty member in the first week of semester.

Assessment items may include one or more of the following: assignments, literature surveys, seminars, exams, etc.
assessments.submission_guidelines: The submission should be prepared in electronic version, preferably in PDF format. The file should be submitted to the Blackboard system, or saved by the supervisor for one year.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

learning_activities.learning_period: Multiple weeksFrom Week 1 To Week 13(22 Jul - 27 Oct)
learning_activities.topic:
Directed Study

Directed reading under the supervision of a faculty member.
